title: [K-12] Sustainable Development Online Course Co-Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Instructional Design Principles and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Online collaborative course design activities for pre-service and in-service teachers to enhance sustainable development education design capabilities, conducted in a smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more sustainability-related educational activities applying inquiry-based teaching methods.
Learners can visually represent instructional design prototypes using technology-enhanced tools (e.g., CompendiumLD).
Learners can propose curriculum improvement plans based on a learner-teacher collaborative model.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
